title: Software Developer
description: Working with team in Faculty of Mechanical and Mechatronics Engeneering, University of Waterloo. to develop and deliver software targeted to support academic administration processes. This includes collecting and analyzing data into reports, configuring, testing and delivering requirements to internal administrative faculty and staff (administrative, technical and teaching) teams. To upgrade existing framework, test functionality and data integrity.
quote: Before software can be reusable it first has to be usable.
